meaningMnemonic: What you <radical>say</radical> between <radical>five</radical> <radical>mouth</radical>s is a <kanji>language</kanji>. As long as there are five different people saying these same words with their five mouths, it's considered its own language.
readingMnemonic: Another mouth joins in speaking the <kanji>language</kanji>, but it's green and scaled and... it's <reading>Go</reading>dzilla's (ご) mouth! Godzilla speaks this language too.
